p: We first fit the human H7N9 case data to the cumulative human cases using the Richards model growth function ( Equation (2)) to obtain model estimates for the turning point t i and the case number K H of the Richards model growth function (see Figure 2 and Table 1). The turning point for the human case reporting, at 48.94 days (95% CI: [48.51, 49.37]) or the 49 th day after the start of outbreak on February 19, is pinpointed at April 9; while the estimate for the outbreak case number K H is 120.4 [119.6, 121.2], exactly the same as the WHO data if rounded off to the next integer.
